title: Coral Plus Nears 70% Completion
author: Editorial Team
excerpt: Coral Plus, one of our most anticipated luxury apartment projects, has reached 70% completion with structure and key services well underway.

content.text: Coral Plus has successfully passed the 70% construction milestone with all structural work completed across the tower. Mechanical, electrical and plumbing services are being installed level by level, keeping the project firmly on schedule.

Internal finishing work such as plastering, tiling, ceiling installation and door frames has commenced on several floors. Work on the podium, infinity pool deck and common lifestyle areas is progressing in parallel to ensure a seamless handover experience.
With strong buyer interest and a majority of units already reserved, Coral Plus is fast emerging as one of the most desirable sea-front apartment projects along Marine Drive.

highlights: Overall project progress has surpassed 70%.
Structural work completed; MEP and finishes in progress.
Infinity pool deck and lifestyle amenities under construction.
Majority of apartments already reserved by buyers.

title: Coral Vista Wins Best Residential Project Award
author: Editorial Team
excerpt: Coral Vista has been recognised as the Best Residential Project at the Sri Lanka Property Excellence Awards 2025.

content.text: Coral Vista was honoured with the Best Residential Project title at the Sri Lanka Property Excellence Awards 2025, recognising its architectural design, construction quality and resident-centric amenities.
The project scored highly for its efficient layouts, community spaces and long-term value for both homeowners and investors.

highlights: Winner of Best Residential Project 2025.
Recognised for design, quality and liveability.
Strengthens Coral’s reputation in premium developments.

title: Coral Heights Grand Launch Ceremony
author: Editorial Team
excerpt: Coral Heights, our latest luxury project in Colombo 07, was launched with a grand ceremony attended by industry leaders and investors.

content.text: Coral Heights was ceremonially launched in Colombo 07 in the presence of customers, partners and industry stakeholders. The event showcased detailed scale models, interior concepts and lifestyle amenities planned for the project.
Early interest from both local and overseas buyers highlights the demand for premium residential spaces in central Colombo.

highlights: Grand launch hosted in Colombo 07.
Strong participation from investors and industry partners.
Positive response to unit mix and design concepts.

title: Coral Achieves ISO 9001 Certification
author: Editorial Team
excerpt: Coral has received the ISO 9001:2025 Quality Management Certification, reinforcing its commitment to consistent quality and service.

content.text: Coral has been awarded the ISO 9001:2025 Quality Management Certification after a comprehensive audit of its processes, documentation and customer service standards.
The certification reflects Coral’s ongoing focus on delivering reliable, high-quality developments and offering transparent, professional service at every stage.

highlights: ISO 9001:2025 Quality Management Certification achieved.
Audited across project planning, construction and customer service.
Assures customers of consistent quality and governance.

title: Coral Partners with Leading Interior Design Firm to Elevate Luxury Living
author: John Doe
excerpt: Coral Group has formed a strategic partnership with Urban Edge Interiors to enhance the lifestyle experience of upcoming luxury developments.

content.text: Colombo, Sri Lanka — Coral Group, a pioneer in redefining modern luxury living, has officially announced its strategic partnership with Urban Edge Interiors, one of Sri Lanka’s most acclaimed interior design firms.

The collaboration aims to enhance the lifestyle experience of Coral’s upcoming residential projects, including Coral Plus and Coral Heights, by integrating innovative designs, sustainable materials and state-of-the-art aesthetics.

The partnership focuses on creating personalised living spaces that combine style, comfort and functionality. Urban Edge Interiors brings over 15 years of global experience in designing contemporary homes that balance elegance with practicality.

“Our goal has always been to go beyond simply building homes — we want to create living experiences that inspire,” said Nishan Perera, Managing Director of Coral Group. “Partnering with Urban Edge Interiors allows us to bring a fresh design perspective that blends innovation with sophistication.”

The collaboration includes introducing smart interior solutions, premium-grade finishes and modern layouts optimised for space efficiency. Coral’s upcoming developments will feature customisable interiors, allowing homeowners to personalise key aspects of their living spaces.
Both companies are committed to sustainability by adopting eco-friendly materials, energy-efficient lighting and water-saving systems, reflecting Coral’s dedication to green building practices.
The first showcase of this partnership will be unveiled in Coral Plus, expected to launch in early 2026, followed by several other luxury developments.

highlights: Coral Group partners with Urban Edge Interiors to enhance luxury apartment designs.
Focus on personalised interiors with premium finishes and modern layouts.
Introduction of sustainable and smart interior solutions.
First results of the partnership to debut at Coral Plus in early 2026.

title: Coral Heights Grand Opening Ceremony
author: Editorial Team
excerpt: Coral Holdings celebrated the grand opening of Coral Heights, a modern luxury apartment complex in Colombo.

content.text: Coral Heights officially opened its doors with a ribbon-cutting ceremony attended by residents, partners and dignitaries. Guests were taken on guided tours of model apartments and lifestyle facilities.
The successful opening marks another milestone in Coral’s journey of delivering high-quality residential developments in central Colombo.

highlights: Grand opening hosted on-site at Coral Heights.
Strong attendance from new homeowners and partners.
Amenities and common areas fully operational from day one.

title: Coral Holdings Wins Best Property Developer Award
author: Editorial Team
excerpt: Coral Holdings was recognised as Sri Lanka’s Best Property Developer 2025 at the National Real Estate Awards.

content.text: Coral Holdings received the Best Property Developer 2025 award at the National Real Estate Awards, acknowledging its portfolio of high-performing residential projects and its reputation for reliability.
The accolade highlights Coral’s commitment to innovation, construction excellence and long-term value creation for customers.

highlights: Named Best Property Developer 2025 in Sri Lanka.
Recognised for consistent delivery and customer trust.
Reinforces Coral’s leadership in the apartment sector.

title: Coral Plus Project 90% Sold Out
author: Editorial Team
excerpt: Coral Holdings announces that 90% of Coral Plus luxury apartments are officially sold.

content.text: With construction progressing rapidly, Coral Plus has achieved a 90% sell-out ratio, driven by strong interest from both end-users and investors.
The limited balance units offer a final opportunity to secure a sea-front home along Marine Drive with premium amenities and long-term capital appreciation potential.

highlights: 90% of Coral Plus apartments sold.
Strong mix of homeowners and investors.
Only a limited number of units remaining.

title: Coral Holdings Expands to Galle with New Villas
author: Editorial Team
excerpt: Coral Holdings launches a new beachfront villa project in Galle aimed at high-end investors and holiday-home buyers.

content.text: Coral Holdings has announced its entry into Galle with a new collection of beachfront villas designed for premium holiday living and investment.
The project will feature spacious villas, private pools and direct beach access, catering to both local and international buyers seeking exclusive coastal properties.

highlights: First Coral villa development in Galle.
Beachfront location with private lifestyle amenities.
Targeted at high-end investors and holiday-home seekers.
